[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_module=”1664″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” module_class=”fp-page-header” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _dynamic_attributes=”title,background_image” _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|300|||||||” title_font_size=”90px” content_link_text_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.78)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”60%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9mZWF0dXJlZF9pbWFnZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7fX0=@” min_height=”600px” min_height_tablet=”420px” min_height_phone=”200px” min_height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”50px” title_font_size_phone=”32px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_shadow_style=”preset3″ content_link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” content_link_text_color__hover=”#FEC357″]

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”]

Careers

Check out these rewarding opportunities at our National and Affiliate locations. Jobs at Family Promise provide an exciting opportunity to make a difference in the lives of families experiencing homelessness.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”e2706452-e80d-40e5-9995-92bf7a295f77″ hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_accordion_item title=”FAMILY PROMISE NATIONAL” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default”]

Chief Technology Officer – Family Promise National
Summit, NJ, or Remote

Education Associate – Family Promise National
Summit, NJ, or Remote

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”ARKANSAS” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Communications/PR VISTA – Family Promise of Pulaski County
Little Rock, AR

Community Strategist VISTA – Family Promise of Pulaski County
Little Rock, AR

Resource Development VISTA – Family Promise of Pulaski County
Little Rock, AR

Volunteer Engagement VISTA – Family Promise of Pulaski County
Little Rock, AR

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”FLORIDA” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Executive Director – Family Promise of North Central Palm Beach County
West Palm Beach, FL

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”IDAHO” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Program Assistant– Family Promise of the Palouse
Moscow, ID

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”IOWA” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Case Manager – Family Promise of Linn County
Cedar Rapids, IA

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”INDIANA” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Caretaker – Family Promise of Greater Lafayette
Lafayette, In

Executive Director – Family Promise of Greater Lafayette
Lafayette, IN

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”MICHIGAN” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Family Case Manager – Family Promise of Genesee County
Flint, MI

Congregational Development Manager – Family Promise of Grand Rapids
Grand Rapids, MI

Office Administrator – Family Promise of Grand Rapids
Grand Rapids, MI

Resource Generation & Management Specialist AmeriCorps Member – Family Promise of Grand Rapids
Grand Rapids, MI

Vice President of Finance – Family Promise of Grand Rapids
Grand Rapids, MI

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”MONTANA” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Assistant Early Learning Center Director – Family Promise of Gallatin Valley
Bozeman, MT

Family Case Manager – Family Promise of Gallatin Valley
Bozeman, MT

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”NEW JERSEY” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Family Case Manager – Family Promise of Essex County
Montclair, NJ

Full Charge Bookkeeper – Family Promise Morris County
Morristown, NJ

Case Manager – Family Promise of Southern Ocean County
West Creek, NJ

MSW Case Manager –Family Promise of Sussex County
Newton, NJ

Administrative Assistant – Family Promise Union County
Elizabeth, NJ

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”OHIO” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Behavioral Health Therapist  – Family Promise of Greater Cleveland
Cleveland, OH

Support Staff – Family Promise of Greater Cleveland
Cleveland, OH

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”VIRGINIA” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ open=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″] Shelter Manager – Family Promise of Greater Roanoke
Salem, Virginia [/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”WASHINGTON” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Part-Time Administrative Support Staff – Family Promise of Clark County
Camas, WA

Accountant/Bookkeeper – Family Promise of Spokane
Spokane, WA

Assistant Shelter Supervisor – Family Promise of Spokane
Spokane, WA

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”WISCONSIN” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Homeless Shelter Worker – Family Promise of the Chippewa Valley – Beacon House
Eau Claire, WI

Executive Assistant  – Family Promise of Washington County, Inc.
West Bend, WI

[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/hall-county-campers-1-1.jpg” alt=”campers and staff take a selfie” title_text=”hall-county-campers (1)” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#472D5B”]

PLEASE NOTE THAT THE JOBS LISTED ABOVE ARE WITH OUR AFFILIATE LOCATIONS AND NOT BASED IN OUR NATIONAL OFFICE UNLESS OTHERWISE INDICATED. PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT FAMILY PROMISE NATIONAL WITH INQUIRIES REGARDING JOB DESCRIPTIONS OR HIRING TIMELINES.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
